item.title: Coffee Corner: Introduction to 3D Probabilistic Stability Analysis in GeoStudio
item.description: Join us to learn more about probabilistic analysis in 3D limit equilibrium stability assessments including its implementation in SLOPE3D and defining probabilistic parameters and results interpretation.

item.title: GeoStudio Workshop: 2D+3D Slope Stability and Groundwater Flow Analysis | April 7-9 2025 | Denver USA
item.description: Register until March 24 2025 and join us for this 3-day training which will provide you with the fundamental skills for conducting comprehensive slope stability and groundwater flow analysis
